abstract.p: Burger King restaurant near Times Square has computers that are equipped with 3Com digital cameras so diners can send short streaming video clips of themselves to e-mail adresses of their choice (S)

block.p: Even sending a postcard from Times Square has gone high-tech. The Burger King restaurant at 327 West 42nd Street in Manhattan has computers that are equipped with 3Com digital cameras so diners can send short streaming video clips of themselves to e-mail addresses of their choice. To use one of the 16 PC's in the restaurant, a customer has to purchase a Value Meal at the store to receive a password good for 20 minutes of free computing time over a high-speed digital connection.
